Hey @lirbank,

:unamused: Your PR doesn't modify any tests, so it's hard to know what's being fixed, and your changes might regress in the future. Please consider [adding tests](https://github.com/DefinitelyTyped/DefinitelyTyped#user-content-test-editing-an-existing-package) to cover the change you're making.
